definitions: To yield to an overpowering force or overwhreling desire.; To give up, or give in.; To die.; To be brought down by something.
examples: Thai culture as in many other Asian cultures succumbs to the influence of westernization; a person who had been resisting but finally gives into peer pressure. A soldier killed on the battlefield at night may have simply given up and surrendered, thereby falling victim not only physically through death but also metaphorically by 'succumbed'.
